actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish penalties for participation in illegal gang activity.
short_title: Penalties Against Gang Violence Act of 1991

summary.text: Penalties Against Gang Violence Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prescribe: (1) penalties for promoting, furthering, or assisting in any felonious criminal conduct by the members of a criminal gang with knowledge that its members engage in a pattern of criminal gang activity; and (2) enhanced penalties for offenses committed knowingly for the benefit of, at the direction of, or in association with a criminal gang and for such offenses which result in serious bodily injury.

titles.title: Penalties Against Gang Violence Act of 1991
A bill to establish penalties for participation in illegal gang activity.
